Di Tengah Heboh Anggaran Aneh, Kepala Bappeda DKI Mundur
01 Nov 2019, 16:16 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Satu lagi anak buah Gubernur DKI, Anies Baswedan, mengundurkan diri dari jabatannya. Setelah Kadis Pariwisata dan Budaya DKI Edy Junaedi, kini giliran Kepala Badan Perencanaan dan Pembangunan Daerah (Bappeda) Sri Mahendra yang mundur.
"Surat pengunduran diri Kepala Bappeda diserahkan hari ini," kata Anies saat jumpa pers di Balai Kota DKI, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Anies lalu mempersilakan Mahendra untuk menyampaikan pengunduran dirinya di depan media. Bicara singkat, Mahendra mengatakan Pemprov DKI membutuhkan Bappeda yang lebih baik.
"Situasi dan kondisi yang terjadi saat ini yang membutuhkan kinerja Bappeda yang lebih baik lagi. Saya mengajukan permohonan untuk mengundurkan diri dengan harapan agar akselerasi dapat lebih ditingkatkan," ucap Mahendra.
Bappeda sendiri bertanggungjawab menyusun rencana anggaran DKI Jakarta. Dalam berapa waktu terakhir, rencana anggaran DKI sedang disorot karena dianggap janggal, salah satunya soal anggaran lem Aibon Rp 83 miliar.
Sehari sebelumnya, Edy Junaedi lebih dahulu mengundurkan diri dari jabatannya sebagai Kadis Pariwisata dan Budaya DKI dengan alasan ingin jadi staf di TMII. Sebelum pengunduran diri Edy itu, Dinas Pariwisata sempat jadi sorotan gara-gara anggaran influencer Rp 5 miliar.

In the Middle of a Strange Budget, the Head of DKI Bappeda Resigns
01 Nov 2019, 16:16 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Another of DKI Governor's men, Anies Baswedan, resigned from his position. After the Head of DKI Jakarta Tourism and Culture Edy Junaedi, now it is the turn of the Head of the Regional Planning and Development Agency (Bappeda) Sri Mahendra to resign.
"The resignation letter of the Head of Bappeda was submitted today," Anies said during a press conference at the City Hall of DKI, Central Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019).
Anies then invited Mahendra to submit his resignation before the media. Short talk, Mahendra said the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government needed a better Bappeda.
"The current situation and conditions that require better Bappeda performance. I submit a request to resign with the hope that acceleration can be further improved," said Mahendra.
Bappeda itself is responsible for preparing the DKI Jakarta budget plan. In the last few years, the DKI budget plan is being highlighted because it is considered odd, one of which is the Aibon glue budget of Rp. 83 billion.
The day before, Edy Junaedi first resigned from his position as Head of Tourism and Culture DKI on the grounds of wanting to become a staff at TMII. Before Edy's resignation, the Department of Tourism was in the spotlight because of the Rp 5 billion influencer budget.
